testcase.name: Check if user is able to login with invalid User Name and Password
testcase.summary:
Steps to reproduce

1 . Open the LeanA3 test link

2 . Login with abcd / lean123 and check for the error message

Expected result

An error message should be displayed saying that "Authentication failed. Please try again. "

step.expectedresults: Should open the A3 Creator Login page
Should open the A3 Creator Login page

testcase.name: Check if user is able to login with valid User Name and invalid password
testcase.summary:
Steps to reproduce

1 . Open the LeanA3 test link

2 . Login with admin@leantaas.com / abcd and check for the error message

Expected result

An error message should be displayed saying that "Authentication failed. Please try again."

step.expectedresults: Should open the A3 Creator Login page

testcase.name: Check for the error message when clicks on LOG IN button with out entering User Name and Password
testcase.summary:
Steps to reproduce

1 . Open LeanA3 test link

2 . Click on Login button with out entering the User Name and Password and check for the error message

Expected result

An error message should be displayed saying that "Authentication failed. Please try again."

step.expectedresults: Should open the A3 Creator Login page

testcase.name: Check if user is able to Login with valid credentails
testcase.summary:
Steps to reproduce

1 . Open LeanA3 test link

2 . Login with valid credentails and check if user is able to login inside the application

Expected result

User should be able to login inside the application

step.expectedresults: Should open the A3 Creator Login page
